Former Reds manager David Moyes is in charge of the Black Cats and he will be out to avenge their 3-1 defeat in December, which was his first return to Old Trafford after leaving the club.

What is the latest team news?
Ashley Young and Wayne Rooney are doubts but Antonio Valencia could return after being rested for the game against Everton when Luke Shaw came off the bench to good effect. Phil Jones, Chris Smalling and Juan Mata are all set to miss out due to injury. Adnan Januzaj is ineligible for Sunderland due to the terms of his loan from United but Donald Love, John O'Shea and Darron Gibson could all come up against their old employers. Another ex-Reds player, Paddy McNair, is injured, along with Duncan Watmore, Jan Kirchhoff and Steven Pienaar. Lee Cattermole returned at Leicester City on Tuesday with Victor Anichebe fit enough to come on as a substitute.
